item.title: The Mashable Open Web Awards
item.description: If you like what we are doing over on LouderVoice, why not vote for us in the Mashable Open Web Awards. You can do it below. Â Mashable Open Web Awards Don’t forget to vote for all your favourite Irish WebApps, many of which can be found over at Web2Ireland.org.
